description.value: Life often imitates art, and you've learned to deploy your dramatic training in dangerous situations, whether it's using your talent for pratfalls to cushion a real drop or faking out an enemy with your improv antics. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Feign Death] feat, ignoring the prerequisites. In addition, you can use Performance instead of Deception to [[/act create-a-diversion skill=performance]].

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
